definition: the act of grasping, get the meaning of something
details:
noun
- the act of grasping
= synonyms: clasp
- an intellectual hold or understanding
= synonyms: grip
- the limit of capability
= synonyms: reach
- understanding of the nature or meaning or quality or magnitude of something
= example: understanding of the nature or meaning or quality or magnitude of something
= synonyms: appreciation
verb
- get the meaning of something
= synonyms: dig
- hold firmly
= synonyms: hold on
